revision.text:
'''Unova''' is the fifth [[Regions|Region]] in the Pokéclicker world. The Pokédex for this region contains 155 Pokémon from Victini #494 to Genesect #649. [[File:Unova_V0.8.14.png|thumb|A Town Map of the Unova region]] ===[[Towns & Cities#Unova|Towns, Cities]], and [[Shops#Unova: Locations & Items|Shops]]=== {| class="wikitable" |- | [[Towns & Cities#Unova|Aspertia City]] || [[Towns & Cities#Unova|Floccessy Town]] || [[Towns & Cities#Unova|Virbank City]] || [[Towns & Cities#Unova|Castelia City]] |- | [[Towns & Cities#Unova|Nimbasa City]] || [[Towns & Cities#Unova|Driftveil City]] || [[Towns & Cities#Unova|Mistralton City]] || [[Towns & Cities#Unova|Lentimas Town]] |- | [[Towns & Cities#Unova|Undella Town]] || [[Towns & Cities#Unova|Lacunosa Town]] || [[Towns & Cities#Unova|Opelucid City]] || [[Towns & Cities#Unova|Humilau City]] |- | [[Towns & Cities#Unova|Pokémon League Unova]] || [[Towns & Cities#Unova|Black and White Park]] || [[Towns & Cities#Unova|Icirrus City]] || [[Towns & Cities#Unova|Nacrene City]] |- | [[Towns & Cities#Unova|Striaton City]] || [[Towns & Cities#Unova|Accumula Town]] || [[Towns & Cities#Unova|Nuvema Town]] || [[Towns & Cities#Unova|Anville Town]] |} ===Routes=== ''See [[Route Statistics]] for more in-depth info.'' {| class="wikitable" style="text-align: center;" |- ! ''Trainers'': [[File:Team_Plasma_(colress).png|30px]] '''Team Plasma Colress''' ([[File:Magneton.png|30px]],[[File:Rotom_(wash).png|30px]],[[File:Metagross.png|30px]],[[File:Beheeyem.png|30px]],[[File:Magnezone.png|30px]],[[File:Klinklang.png|30px]]) |- |} ===Walkthrough=== [[File:Unova_Flow_Chart.png|500px]] *Liberty Garden is located in the sea South of Virbank City *Relic Passage is located West of Route 4 and Relic Castle *Lentimas Town is located directly East of Mistralton City *Plasma Frigate is located East of Seaside Cave *Cave of Being is located South of Route 20 *Abundant Shrine is located West of Route 14 *Anville Town is located in the Northwest Corner of the map *Twist Mountain is located next to Celestial Tower *Route 8 is located next to Route 9 *Pledge Grove is located North of Floccesy Town *Pinwheel Forest in located Northeast of Castelia City, and next to Nacrene City *Route 14 must be cleared and both Tornadus and Thundurus must be caught to unlock Abundant Shrine *Either Route 7 must be cleared to unlock Twist Mountain, or Route 9 must be cleared to unlock Route 8 *After clearing either Twist Mountain or Route 8, the other is unlocked *Either Route 14 must be cleared to unlock Route 15, or Route 16 must be cleared to unlock Black and White Park *After either unlocking Black and White City or clearing Route 15, the other is unlocked *Meloetta (Aria) must be caught to unlock Anville Town *Keldeo must be caught to unlock Pledge Grove ===Exclusive Pokémon=== ====[[Fossils]] ==== {| class="wikitable sortable" style="text-align: center;" |- !
